ingredients.ingredient: 12 (7.2 ounce) packages Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
6 tablespoons shredded chicken in BBQ sauce, warmed
2 ounces white Cheddar cheese, cut into 12 small squares
2 thick bacon slices cooked thick bacon strips, cut into 12 pieces

cookingTips: Assemble sliders just before serving to keep pretzels crispy
Warm chicken sauce gently to prevent drying out
Toast pretzel crisps briefly for extra crunch and warmth
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to make quick, crispy pretzel slider appetizers with pulled chicken and bacon
